criteria: Use of technology to produce and publish writing.
Linking to and citing sources appropriately.
Interaction and collaboration with others using technology.
descriptions: No use of technology to produce or publish writing.
Limited attempt to use technology; writing is not effectively produced or published.
Technology is used, but the output is basic with minimal formatting or design.
Technology is adequately used to produce and publish writing; basic formatting is present.
Technology is effectively used, with good formatting and design enhancing the writing.
Skillfully uses technology to produce and publish writing with advanced formatting and design elements that significantly enhance the presentation.
No sources are linked or cited.
Attempt to link or cite sources is made, but is incorrect or incomplete.
Some sources are linked and cited, but with errors in formatting or relevance.
Sources are linked and cited adequately, with minor errors in formatting.
Sources are accurately linked and cited, following a consistent citation style.
Sources are expertly linked and cited, enhancing the credibility and depth of the writing while following a consistent citation style.
No interaction or collaboration with others is demonstrated.
Minimal attempt to interact or collaborate with others using technology.
Basic interaction or collaboration is demonstrated, but effectiveness is limited.
Adequate interaction and collaboration with others is evident through technology.
Effective interaction and collaboration with others, enhancing the overall quality of the work.
Exemplary interaction and collaboration with others using technology, significantly contributing to the project's success.
